assessment-question.definition: Is there an adequate justification for the exception(s) identified?
assessment-question.source-info:
e-reporting: • Exception code • Exception code • ExceptionOldCode • Exception name • Exception type (according to options under Art. 14: (1) (a)-(e), (4)) • ExceptionReason • Relevant targets • Relevant Pressures • GES component • Relevant Features • Region Subregion • Marine Reporting Unit • Spatial coverage of the exception • Justification Description • Mitigation (if applicable) • Measure ad hoc (if applicable) • Further information • ExceptionReason • GESachieved
Text report (if e-reporting incomplete)
